name: Mandrake Root
description: A potent root known for its magical properties. Handle with care.

name: Dragon Scale
description: A shimmering scale from the mighty dragon. Adds resilience to potions.

name: Phoenix Feather
description: A feather imbued with the essence of rebirth and renewal.

name: Eye of Newt
description: A mystical eye known for its transformative properties.

name: Wolfsbane
description: A rare herb used to enhance potion potency, but handle with caution.

name: Fairy Dust
description: Glimmering powder that adds a touch of enchantment to potions.

name: Bigfoot's Footskin
description: Footskin shaved from the legend that has a weirdly calming scent. It has a distinct flavor and can be brewed as tea for male vigor.

name: Sandman's Crust
description: Eye gunk collected from the man himself. This dust is used to help insomniacs sleep.

name: Goblin's Booger
description: Dried mucus with dust particles and hair that emanates a mysterious green light in the dark.

name: Ectoplasm
description: A green, gooey, magical gel that is disgusting and sticky.
